Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Bitsoominjia Nyasaye biosi bili mwikulu nende mushialo, naye niye Omwami, Owamachesi muno
Enywe Abasuubili, shichila shina ni muboolanga akamulakhola tawe
Ni eshisinyo eshikhongo imbeli wa Nyasaye okhuboola kamulakhola
Toto bwene Nyasaye yayanza balia abalwananga khu injila yiyie khulunyaali shinga lisisi liatilana

Ne Olwa Musa yaboolela Abandu bebe mbu: “Enywe Abandu banje shichila shina musinyisinjia, ne toto mwamanya mbu esie endi Omurumwa wa Nyasaye khwinywe?” ne olwabatsililila nobubii bwabu, Nyasaye yalekha emioyo chikore, ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu abakori tawe

Yitsulila Olwa Yesu Omwana wa Mariam yaboola mbu : “Enywe Abana ba Israel esie endi Omurumwa wa Nyasaye khwinywe, efuchilila obwatoto bwendi nabo okhurula mutaurati, nende okhubalachilisia Omurumwa unondakhwo ulangwa mbu Ahmed, olwa yabeetsela baboola mbu buno nobulosi bulolekha
Ne wina wetsimbi muno, okhushilakhwo ulia uchishila Nyasaye abubeyi, naye alangungwa mubusalamu ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu ababii tawe
Benyanga okhusumia obulafu bwa Nyasaye ne minwa chiabu, ne Nyasaye alatinyia abulafu bubwe kata abakhayi nibafimba
Niye owaruma Omurumwa wuwe nende obulunjifu nende idini ya toto ilolekhane habulafu okhushila tsi dini thindi, kata Abatsokaasi nibafimba
